<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Sifkesh (The Whispered Doubt)](/Deities.aspx?ID=81)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Spread doubt among the faithful, ruin the reputation of religions, provoke wrongdoers to suicide instead of allowing for redemption

**Anathema** Spread hope, offer forgiveness, sincerely honor or call upon another god

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Favored Weapon** [War Razor](/Weapons.aspx?ID=307)

**Domains** [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=23), [Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=24), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=50), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ill Omen](/Spells.aspx?ID=696)

- **5th**
[Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57)

- **5th**
[Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=314)

</column>
name: Sifkesh (The Whispered Doubt)
